metadata.title: CVE-2023-5841 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Due to a failure in validating the number of scanline samples of a OpenEXRfile containing deep scanline data, Academy Software Foundation OpenEXimage parsing library version 3.2.1 and prior is susceptible to aheap-based buffer overflow vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openexr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
